project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a text file, counts the frequency of each word, and displays the top 10 most common words.

task.name: Implement the function to read the text file and store its content
Implement the function to count the frequency of each word
Implement the function to sort and retrieve the top 10 most common words
Write tests for the functions implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented functions to ensure they function correctly
